name: Accessible Dungeon
description:
Help a hero traverse through dangerous dungeon, meeting wall of enemies on his path.

Movement happens rhythmically, according to beat in the background. Usage of headphones is advised.

Controls:

[WSAD] - Movement

[Spacebar] - Raise weapon

[WSD] - Attack when weapon is risen

Authors:

Łukasz 'dot' Biel

Bartłomiej 'Saper' Czarnak
